user.title: Details for Slide (local API)
user.description: Provide information to connect to the Slide device

data_description.api_version: 1 or 2. 1 is pre Aug-2023 firmware. 2 is for Aug-2023 or later (default = 2)
data_description.ip_address: The hostname or IP address of your local Slide
data_description.password: The device code of your Slide (inside of the Slide or in the box, length is 8 characters). NOTE: With api_version 2 you can fill in anything here, it is not used by the local API.

abort.discovery_connection_failed: The setup of the discovered device failed with the following error: {error}. Please try to set it up manually.

update_error.message: Error while updating data from the API.
